ellington.title: Ellington @ PSU Bike Hub
ellington.bio: Decorated in homage to the iconic PDX airport carpet, this piano has a smooth, quiet sound.

hancock.title: Hancock @ Macy's
hancock.bio: Designed and painted by Jody Katopothis and a whole crew of helpers and supporters.

joplin.title: Joplin @ ADX
joplin.bio: One of our originals! Not really a public piano, but you can play it when you are at the wonderful ADX facility. Go on in and give it a try! Open during ADX hours.

liszt.title: Liszt @ Congress Plaza
liszt.bio: This piano is uniquely Portland and a must-see work of art. Decorated by North and sponsored by Becker Capital Management, Inc.

mozart.title: Mozart @ Unitas Plaza
mozart.bio: On the move again! Decorated by Jennifer Mark and Juliet Moran of Open Eye Art and sponsored by Umpqua Bank.

rmcartney.title: McCartney @ Pioneer Courthouse Square
rmcartney.bio: The result of a collaboration with Rather Severe: Design Duo

seeingsound.title: #SeeingSound @ OMSI
seeingsound.bio: The result of a collaboration with CymaSpace, & Lucid Design, this vintage piano includes sound-reactive visualization electronics that respond to sounds and tones, music becoming light, color and movement.
